code: I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?
I’m light as a feather but even the strongest person can’t hold me. What am I?
I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. What am I?
The more of me you take away, the more I remain. What am I?
I am always in front of you but can’t be seen. What am I?
I’m always coming but never arrive. What am I?
I have branches but no fruit, trunk, or leaves. What am I?
The more you remove from me, the bigger I get. What am I?
I am bought by the yard but worn by the foot. What am I?
I am black when clean and white when dirty. What am I?
